diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The patient presented with right lower quadrant (RLQ) and left lower quadrant (LLQ) abdominal pain, with a history of diverticulitis. The CT scan showed a dilated appendix with mild periappendiceal fat stranding and an appendicolith at the base, which supports the diagnosis of appendicitis. Additionally, mild fat stranding surrounding a diverticulum along the proximal sigmoid colon was noted, indicating diverticulitis. The location and character of the pain, as well as the CT findings, corroborate the diagnosis.
